author: Annie Martin
title: Khloe Kardashian responds to Amy Schumer's weight remarks
text:
1 of 6 | License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 13 (UPI) -- Khloe Kardashian responded to Amy Schumer 's recent remarks about her weight on Twitter.
The 31-year-old reality star appeared to hit back at the 34-year-old actress after Schumer said Kardashian was no longer a role model for young girls while hosting Saturday's episode of Saturday Night Live .
"We have to be a role model for these little girls because who do they have? All they have, literally, is the Kardashians," Schumer declared during her opening monologue. "And is that a great message for little girls? A whole family of women that take the faces they were born with as a light suggestion?"
"We used to have Khloe," the comedian continued. "Khloe was ours, right? Whenever there's a group of women, you identify with one of them. Khloe, she lost half her body weight -- she lost a Kendall. We have nothing, and I want good role models!"
Kardashian has lost 35 pounds thus far, and often shares photos from the gym on social media. She revealed her slimmed-down frame on the August/September cover of Complex, and later said on her website she shed the pounds on her own terms for her self-esteem.
"No need 2 tear down others just 2 make urself feel bigger," the reality star tweeted on Sunday after Schumer's episode. "It actually makes u quite small. I'm on a healthy journey. I don't care 4the hate. Let's uplift one another!!! Happy Sunday! Stay smiling!!!'
Schumer last appeared in Trainwreck with Bill Hader , and will return for a fourth season of her Comedy Central series, Inside Amy Schumer , in spring 2016. Kardashian and her family continue to star on the E! series Keeping Up with the Kardashians , which completed an 11th season Sunday.
